Class PrescriptionItem

java.lang.Object
entity.EntityObject
entity.medicine.PrescriptionItem
public class PrescriptionItem extends EntityObject
Represents an item in a prescription, which is a specific medicine prescribed along with its quantity, status, and associated prescription details.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes

    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    PrescriptionItem.ItemStatus
    Enum representing the possible statuses of a prescription item.

      Default constructor for the PrescriptionItem class.

    • PrescriptionItem

      public PrescriptionItem(String id, String prescriptionId, String medicineId, int quantity, PrescriptionItem.ItemStatus status, String notes)
      Constructor to create a new prescription item with specified details.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique ID of the prescription item.
      prescriptionId - The ID of the associated prescription.
      medicineId - The ID of the prescribed medicine.
      quantity - The quantity of the medicine prescribed.
      status - The current status of the prescription item.
      notes - Additional notes regarding the prescription item.
